text: Rahama railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Rahama village. Its code is RHMA. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Rahama railway station. ==Major Trains== * Santragachi – Paradeep Superfast Express * Paradeep − Puri Intercity Express * Paradeep – Visakhapatnam Superfast Express ==See also== * Jagatsinghpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jagatsinghpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Rahama railway station
